DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect single dose indacaterol single dose tiotropium inspiratory capacity .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effects Indacaterol Tiotropium Inspiratory Capacity
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis moderate ( classified Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease [ GOLD ] Guidelines , 2007 ) chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) : 1 . Smoking history least 10 packyears . 2 . Forced expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 80 % â‰¥ 50 % predict normal value . 3 . Postbronchodilator FEV1/Force vital capacity ( FVC ) < 0.7 . Patients COPD exacerbation require systemic glucocorticosteroid treatment antibiotic and/or hospitalization 6 week prior screen . Patients respiratory tract infection within 6 week prior screen . Patients concomitant pulmonary disease . Patients alpha1antitrypsin deficiency . Patients contraindication tiotropium treatment . Patients history hypersensitivity study drug drug similar drug class . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply study .
